title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form SE1B - Amended affidavit in relation to settlement of estate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form SE1B - Amended affidavit in relation to settlement of estate

State Regulations
SURROGATE'S COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF ________
________X AMENDED AFFIDAVIT
VOLUNTARY ADMINISTRATION, Estate of IN
RELATION TO SETTLEMENT
OF ESTATE
________, UNDER ARTICLE 13, SCPA
Deceased File No. ________
________X
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF ________)
I, ________, being duly sworn, depose and
say: (Name)
1. I am the voluntary administrator/trix
of the above-named decedent and make this affidavit pursuant to Article 13 of
the Surrogate's Court Procedure Act. The original and any amended affidavits
were filed on the following dates: [list dates] ____________
2. I was found qualified to act as the
voluntary administrator/trix of the above captioned estate by the ________
County Surrogate's Court on the ________ day of ________, 19________
3. The following items of personal
property, owned by the above-named decedent, were not listed in paragraph 9 of
the Affidavit of Voluntary Administration originally filed nor in any amended
affidavits filed with the court. Items of Personal Property Space for

Endorsement

Separately Listed Value of Each Item By

Transferors
____________
____________
____________
____________
Total $________
4. For the items of personal property
listed in paragraph 3, I require ________ additional certificates of voluntary
administration. The value of all of the decendent's
non-exempt assets still does not exceed $ 10,000.00. ______________
(Affiant)

Sworn to before me on
________, 19________
______________
(Print Name)
______________
Notary Public

My Commission Expires:________
NAME OF AFFIANT OR ATTORNEY
FOR AFFIANT: ____________
ADDRESS: ____________
TEL NO.: ________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
SE1B
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
